title: ICYMI: Tumblr’s “This Is White Privilege” Stays Ahead of Its Time
description:
In this episode, Rachelle Hampton and Madison Malone Kircher speak with Dion Beary, a writer and online community builder who founded the Tumblr blog This Is White Privilege. They talk with Beary about where that blog began, its impact on online discourse, and why he stepped away.
Podcast production by Daniel Schroeder and Derek John.

itunes:title: ICYMI: Tumblr’s “This Is White Privilege” Stays Ahead of Its Time
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: The creator of “This Is White Privilege” knows it educated a lot of people, but says he’d never do it again.
